title: Enhancing Competency in Using Library Search Tools: Blended Methodology-Based User Experience Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and online search experience
context.additional_context: Non-real-time content optimized for smartphone-centric learning environments, including hands-on practice with simple mobile search tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more basic interfaces of library search tools and explain their functionalities.
Learners can extract target materials with 80% accuracy using keyword-based search strategies.
Learners can evaluate resources by applying five criteria for judging the relevance of search results.
Learners can propose three or more improvement strategies based on their experience using mobile-optimized search tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
